title: PM grieved over death of old friend Talat Mahmood
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 24 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Thursday expressed grief over the death of his longtime friend Talat Mahmood, saying that he would be missed.
“Saddened by the death today of one of my oldest friends Talat Mahmood – “Tommo” to his friends. He will be missed by all his friends,” the prime minister wrote in a tweet.
Imran Khan extended condolences to the family of Talat Mahmood.
Saddened by the death today of one of my oldest friends Talat Mahmood – "Tommo" to his firends. He will be missed by all his friends. My condolences and prayers go to his family.
— Imran Khan (@ImranKhanPTI) June 24, 2021
